Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, cure serious wounds, lesser restoration, remove blindness/deafness, remove disease

sections.body:
This white ash staff is decorated with inlaid silver runes. It allows use of the following spells:

  • Cure serious wounds (1 charge)
  • Lesser restoration (1 charge)
  • Remove blindness/deafness (2 charges)
  • Remove disease (3 charges)
sections.name: Description
